RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 1 6F Dirt CR: 61. Claiming Purse 7800. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 8 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MOONLIGHT MISS hustled close early saved ground to upper stretch surging past rivals late from the inside. SPEEDY FIRE stalked the pace laying close through the turn looming in the three path upper stretch getting past a tiring pacesetter to salvage place. THATS ALL SHEWROTE away alertly pressed abreast foe shaking clear on the turn, digging in from the two path in upper stretch would tire late between horses. LUCKYWISE slow early was never involved passing a couple down the lane. TERRIFIC LADY off slowly played no factor. SPORT PALACE was always outrun. DAYS REMEMBERED pressed with early speed then gave way on the turn.

ENTRY.NAME: Moonlight Miss
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled early, saved ground, surged clear along inside

ENTRY.NAME: Luckywise
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, passed a couple

ENTRY.NAME: Speedy Fire
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, loomed three path lane, salvaged place

ENTRY.NAME: Days Remembered
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed with early speed, gave way,

ENTRY.NAME: Terrific Lady
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slowly, no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Thats All Shewrote
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, pressed clear turn, dug in two path, tired between

ENTRY.NAME: Sport Palace
ENTRY.COMMENT: always outrun,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 86. Allowance Purse 21200. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 7 Allowed 3 lbs. (Maiden Or Claiming Races For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Estimating Allowances)(W V A Bre d Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LEAD OFF gained four deep on the turn looming outside the leader in upper stretch finding a final burst to run clear late. WELLMAN pressed to a short lead from the inside on the turn edging clear in upper stretch ceding to outside pressure in the final yards. POTENTIAL GRIZZLY tracked evenly through the turn angling four wide in upper stretch mustering enough late to best the others. EMJAY slow early circled out to upper stretch finishing evenly at mid track. WAR NOVEL away alertly pressed the pace through the turn then faded along the inside the final eighth. WICKED CHANCE pressed the pace through the turn then tired between horses into upper stretch. BRYTON'S D J gave way on the turn.

ENTRY.NAME: Bryton's D J
ENTRY.COMMENT: gave way on the turn

ENTRY.NAME: Emjay
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, circled out to lane, finished evenly mid track

ENTRY.NAME: Wellman
ENTRY.OWNER: Brumley, Jerry S. and Reed, Kay
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed to lead inside turn, dug in clear lane, run down

ENTRY.NAME: Potential Grizzly
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked evenly, angled 4 wide lane, outbid others

ENTRY.NAME: War Novel
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, pressed pace, faded inside lane

ENTRY.NAME: Lead Off
ENTRY.COMMENT: gained four deep turn, loomed lane, ran clear late

ENTRY.NAME: Wicked Chance
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, tired lane

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 65. Claiming Purse 7800. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 7 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CATCHING MAGIC pressed bid on the turn extending three deep in upper stretch extending up abreast rival late. SHEA D CAPTURE pressed the pace working a short lead through the turn dueling inside of rival down the lane ceding grudgingly at the end. GOLDEN OAK pressured the pace through the turn extending along the inside down the lane weakening late. SUMMER BOSS flashed early speed then faded on the turn. OVERSEAS LETTER was pulled up entering the turn walking off after the race.

ENTRY.NAME: Overseas Letter
ENTRY.COMMENT: pulled up, walked off

ENTRY.NAME: Summer Boss
ENTRY.COMMENT: flashed speed, faded

ENTRY.NAME: Shea D Capture
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed on lead, between foes top lane, dueled inside late

ENTRY.NAME: Golden Oak
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, dueled on inside to lane, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Catching Magic
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed bid on turn, extended three deep lane, edged up abreast

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 56. Maiden Special Weight Purse 16500. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 116 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FRAGRANT pressed a short lead edging clear on the turn digging in four wide in upper stretch responding to widen late. SUFFICE rallied up to threaten on the turn looming outside rival in upper stretch being turned away late a clear second best. LUNA MIA pressured the pace through the turn weakening in upper stretch holding position with an even finish. STRAIGHT TO GO chased the early pace tiring to upper stretch. HEAVENLY SMILE was always outrun. NOGRATZ offered little.

ENTRY.NAME: Fragrant
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, clear on turn, dug in four path lane, widened

ENTRY.NAME: Suffice
ENTRY.COMMENT: rallied up on the turn, loomed outside leader lane, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Luna Mia
ENTRY.OWNER: Ruiz Lilliam and MM Racing LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, weakened lane, held rest

ENTRY.NAME: Nogratz
ENTRY.COMMENT: offered little

ENTRY.NAME: Heavenly Smile
ENTRY.COMMENT: always outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: Straight to Go
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased the pace, tired lane

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 5 1M Dirt CR: 93. Claiming Purse 14200. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since April 7 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000 (Claiming Races for $8,500 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: HIERRO advanced on the backside giving chase through the far turn extending from mid track down the lane surging late to get up on the wire. ESCAPE VELOCITY set a pressured pace dueling through the far turn into upper stretch digging in under outside pressure being grabbed in the last strides. HEZA HANDFUL stalked the pace pressing in bid on the far turn battling down the lane coming up a touch short between horses. POCO CHARLIE well back early saved ground to upper stretch showing late interest along the rail. PONT DU GARD hustled along kept up for a half then faded on the far turn. FULCO tracked evenly through the backside then gave way on the far turn. DON'T POKE THE CAT raced evenly fading in upper stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Escape Velocity
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace, dueled into lane, dug in late, missed gamely,

ENTRY.NAME: Heza Handful
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, pressed far turn, dueled lane, touch short between

ENTRY.NAME: Don't Poke the Cat
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly, faded lane

ENTRY.NAME: Pont Du Gard
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled along, faded far turn

ENTRY.NAME: Poco Charlie
ENTRY.COMMENT: well back early, saved ground to lane, finished well on rail

ENTRY.NAME: Hierro
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, chased to lane, late surge 5 wide, in time

ENTRY.NAME: Fulco
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked evenly, gave way

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 6 4 1/2F Dirt CR: 73. Claiming Purse 8100. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 8 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DEL MAR FLASH pressed through the turn extending abreast rival in upper stretch edging clear late. ICE FLOE sent hard pressed the pace dueling inside of rival through the turn into upper stretch ceding the issue late. FORTUNA ADIUVAT raced a step slow to upper stretch posing no menace. CHARM WEAVER chased through the turn weakening in upper stretch. HEIDI T was never involved.

ENTRY.NAME: Fortuna Adiuvat
ENTRY.COMMENT: step slow, no menace

ENTRY.NAME: Heidi T
ENTRY.COMMENT: never involved

ENTRY.NAME: Ice Floe
ENTRY.COMMENT: sent hard, pressed inside, dueled lane, ceded late

ENTRY.NAME: Del Mar Flash
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed on turn, extended abreast lane, edged clear

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Red Barons Barn, LLC, Rancho TemescalLLC & Vaya Con Suerte

ENTRY.NAME: Charm Weaver
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased early, faded lane

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 7 1M Dirt CR: 92. Starter Allowance Purse 14200. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $4,000 OR LESS IN 2022-2023. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since April 8 Allowed 3 lbs. (Claiming Races For $5,000 Or Less Not C onsidered In Estimating Allowances) (Preference to Highest Earnings in 2022-2023.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PERFETTO well placed, rallied into the far turn grabbing the lead near the quarter pole clearing in upper stretch pouring it late on while ridden out. COLAVITO prompted the pace through the backside being hooked near the quarter pole, dispatched by the winner in upper stretch would go all out near mid track to save place. BLUEBANK slow early gave a mild rally on the far turn then found best stride along the inside down the lane finishing well. KNOWN went evenly through the backside rallying to bid on the far turn losing momentum in upper stretch dropping off there. QUESTION AUTHORITY tracked the pace chasing on the far turn weakening in upper stretch. PALACE PRINCE played no factor. HARD N'SWEET was always outrun. KITCHI pressed through the backside then wilted abruptly on the far turn.

ENTRY.NAME: Question Authority
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace, chased far turn, weakened lane

ENTRY.NAME: Bluebank
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, mild move far turn, rallied inside, willingly

ENTRY.NAME: Colavito
ENTRY.COMMENT: prompted pace, hooked far turn, no match lane, saved place

ENTRY.NAME: Palace Prince
ENTRY.OWNER: Tijuana Racing Stables Tenenbaum Jeffrey and Bloom Jeffrey
ENTRY.COMMENT: played no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Known
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly, pressed up far turn, leveled off top lane

ENTRY.NAME: Perfetto
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled, rallied into far turn, cleared upper stretch, much best

ENTRY.NAME: Kitchi
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, wilted

ENTRY.NAME: Hard n'Sweet
ENTRY.OWNER: Vickers Richard T and Pena Yendri J
ENTRY.COMMENT: always outrun,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 8 6F Dirt CR: 67. Claiming Purse 7900. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 7 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LATER DAYS away alertly set the pace drawing off on the turn pulling away under a hand ride. SWEET TOOTSIE LU raced evenly to the far turn saving ground into upper stretch surging on the inside to save place. LOVE RAN RED gained on the backside racing evenly five wide into lane rallying late from mid track. HALOFIED chased the pace through the turn being dispatched by the winner in upper stretch weakening late. CODAS HONOR was jammed steadying at the break. SWEET VALERIA fractious pre start veered in at the break. WICKED VALENTINE was never involved. SHAMAN'S PRODIGY was always outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Wicked Valentine
ENTRY.COMMENT: never involved

ENTRY.NAME: Love Ran Red
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, 5 wide into lane, rallied late mid track

ENTRY.NAME: Shaman's Prodigy
ENTRY.COMMENT: always outrun

ENTRY.NAME: Sweet Tootsie Lu
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly, saved ground to lane, rallied up for place

ENTRY.NAME: Codas Honor
ENTRY.COMMENT: jammed steadied break

ENTRY.NAME: Sweet Valeria
ENTRY.COMMENT: fractious gate, veered in break

ENTRY.NAME: Halofied
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased the pace, dispatched top lane, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Later Days
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace, drew off turn, going away, ridden out,

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: The Revocable Trust of Dr. Mikel C.Harrington & Patricia O
